alert.note: Alert for Eastern Cochise County Below 5000 Feet including Douglas, Willcox (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 22 at 2:43PM MST until February 22 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, west winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph due to strong winds ahead of the cold front in southeast Cochise county. Wind speeds will ease to west 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph behind the front. * WHERE...Eastern Cochise County below 5000 feet. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until 5 PM MST this afternoon. For the Wind Advisory, until 8 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Blowing dust with reduced visibilities could result in difficult travel conditions in dust prone areas.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Cochise County Below 5000 Feet including Douglas, Willcox
